content: @simulacrum it would be great when you have time for you to look over the glossary that @Wesley Wiser and I created. We noticed several times that we didn't have terms for concepts we wanted to describe - we think this glossary will make it easier to understand the domain and the codebase: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/issues/938
I think it's good - possibly missing self profile
Can you explain your comment a bit more. I'm not sure I fully grok what you mean.
@rylev just that the self profile page/data adds some additional bits and it's likely good to find canonical names for them
in particular, there's ~3-4 metrics per "query name" (names are hard, these may not be quite the right ones), and it's not obvious that those should be the same metrics as elsewhere
